remarks: Define the class of geometries fulfilling the congruence axioms of reflexivity, identity and transitivity.  These are axioms A1 to A3 of [Schwabhauser] p. 10.  With our distance based notation for congruence, transitivity of congruence boils down to transitivity of equality and is already given by ~ eqtr , so it is not listed in this definition. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Aug-2017.)
statement:
df-trkgc $p |- TarskiGC = { f | [. ( Base ` f ) / p ]. [. ( dist ` f ) / d ]. ( A. x e. p A. y e. p ( x d y ) = ( y d x ) /\ A. x e. p A. y e. p A. z e. p ( ( x d y ) = ( z d z ) -> x = y ) ) } $.
$d d f p x y z $.
